posts.description: This unit has an estimated 6 hour working battery life, with Intel UHD Graphics 500 and 4GB memory.  It has a MicroSD card reader, Headphone Jack, USB3.0, USB Type C, HDMI and VGA ports and is pre-loaded with Windows 10 Home.  They keyboard is backlit and spill proof.  It has an Ethernet RJ45 port to connect you directly to your network.
